comment: Since last week I have been unable to use the app. I always have it set to not auto back up or sync anything when I open the app. Now everytime I try to open the app it has 2 buttons, turn on back up or don't turn back up on. Why is it always trying to make me auto back up for one..when I press do not turn on back up it just spins forever and doesn't let me into my photos at all.
scenarios: When the user presses "do not turn on back up", the app spins indefinitely and does not allow access to their photos.
key sentence: When the user presses "do not turn on back up", the app spins indefinitely and does not allow access to their photos.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, view archive/locked floder, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various deleting and sharing options.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Account Settings', 'description': 'Accessing and managing account settings'}, {'name': 'Turn ON/OFF Backup', 'description': 'Turn on or turn off backup.'}, {'name': 'Free Up Space', 'description': 'Deleting and managing storage space for photos'}, {'name': 'Photos Settings', 'description': 'Adjusting various settings related to photos'}, {'name': 'Help and Feedback', 'description': 'Accessing help and feedback options'}, {'name': 'Privacy Policy', 'description': 'Viewing the privacy policy'}, {'name': 'Terms of Service', 'description': 'Viewing the terms of service'}]

operations.event: click(FrameLayout-Signed in as ran Jin jinran848@gmail.com.Backup is off.Account and settings.:[925,104][1080,237])
click<button id=12 class ="com.google.android.apps.photos:id/photos_autobackup_particle_generic_button"> Turn on backup,  </button>
click<button id=7 class ="com.google.android.apps.photos:id/enable_backup_do_not_backup_button"> Do not back up,  </button>

comment: Since last week I have been unable to use the app. I always have it set to not auto back up or sync anything when I open the app. Now everytime I try to open the app it has 2 buttons, turn on back up or don't turn back up on. Why is it always trying to make me auto back up for one..when I press do not turn on back up it just spins forever and doesn't let me into my photos at all.
scenarios: When the user presses "do not turn on back up", the app spins indefinitely and does not allow access to their photos.
key sentence: When the user presses "do not turn on back up", the app spins indefinitely and does not allow access to their photos.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, view archive/locked floder, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various deleting and sharing options.
